page.title: 10ULLAPOOL FAMILIES.
page.content: ANN - On Thursdays I go to Brownies from 4 pm. to 5.30 pm.,where we play games and go for nature walks. LYNNE - After tea we take our dog for a walk.She hunts rabbits and barks at the birds. GRAEME - When the Forestry tractor breaks down,the driver has to go to Inverness to get the spare parts. NICHOLA - My mother,father,aunt and uncle are managers of Morefield Motel. GRAHAM - Our house has double-glazed windows.Sometimes I cut peats. CLAIRE - We have 2 televisions,one in the kitchen and one in the lounge. We have swimming lessons in Dingwall Pool. BILLY - During the October holiday in Blackpool,we could see the Blackpool Tower from the hotel bathroom window.
